caption.p: Myricetin blood levels in rats after oral administration of 20 mg/kg free myricetin or any of four different SNEDDS formulations ( n = 6); upper right: permeability coefficient ( P eff) of myricetin in single-pass intestinal perfusion model ( n = 3); F04, Capryol 90/Cremophor RH 40/PEG 400 4:3:3; F08, Capryol 90/Cremophor RH 40/1,2-propanediol 4:3:3; F13, Capryol 90/Cremophor EL/Transcutol HP 4:3:3 and F15, Capryol 90/Cremophor RH 40/Transcutol HP 2:7:1. Reproduced from [ 79] with permission
